law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any contrary provisions of this article, an application for a permit required by thi...
law.text: Notwithstanding any contrary provisions of this article, an application for a permit required by this subtitle shall be considered an application for all other permits or licenses required under this article for the facility and the action taken by the Secretary on the application shall be deemed to be action taken on all other permits and licenses, including wetlands licenses.
